name: .XEM File Extension
summary: Learn about .XEM files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: An XEM file is a settings file used by X-Genics eManager. It defines metered units and credits, which businesses can track from within eManager.

content: Businesses use X-Genics eManager and its associated SmartApps to monitor and report on business procedures, quality assurance metrics, and regulatory compliance. One of the items that businesses can use eManager to report on is metered units and credits, of which a business is allowed to use only a certain amount.

instructions: For instructions on how to use XEM files with X-Genics eManager, refer to the program's documentation.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
